reviews.review: Nice game but dont hack you will get banned

Old But Gold, After 5 years of owning the game playing it now feels like playing on day one everything still there !.. The fun, The rush, The Hackers.. i would say you have a 25% chance to run into them they are everywhere on my team on the other team...
When you play comp without russians you usually win, when you play with russians you usually lose :P
